projects.title: WHITEBOARD APPLICATION
projects.description: This is a full-stack React Application with Web Socket connections to allow collaborative whiteboarding tool, saving and restoring the sketches.

projects.title: Journal
projects.description: It’s a Journaling Web Application which implements EJS templating where one can performs CRUD operations through RESTful API’s and add new journal post. The posts are stored in a MongoDB Atlas database.

projects.title: Crypto-Coins
projects.description: React App where one can check the current market rate, performance of any crypto-coin

projects.title: Expense Manager
projects.description: React application where one can list down all their expenses and manage them.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio website where all my works is being displayed.
